NYXify Technologies is a digital-first company focused on helping brands and creators grow through AI-enabled marketing, influencer campaigns, and content innovation. We work with emerging startups, DTC brands, and creator-led businesses to drive impact through creative and performance-driven strategies.

JobTitle: Associate - Campaign Execution & Helpdesk Support - Fresher
About:
Associate - Campaign Execution & Helpdesk Support
Location: Thane, India (During Training) | Work From Home (Post-Training)
Shift Timings: 6 PM to 3 AM IST

About the Role
Netcore Cloud is seeking a customer-facing, technically adept professional to join as a Campaign Execution & Helpdesk Support Engineer. This is a dual-role opportunity where you will execute digital campaigns and provide technical support for clients, ensuring seamless adoption and optimal use of our platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

A. Campaign Execution
1. Plan, set up, and execute campaigns (Email, SMS, Voice, Automation) on time.
2. Make primary HTML modifications when required.
3. Monitor campaign delivery and analyze performance reports with actionable insights.

B. Helpdesk Support
1. Provide first-level technical support through phone, email, and ticketing tools.
2. Handle and resolve tickets effectively, balancing campaign execution and support tasks.
3. Troubleshoot customer-reported issues related to platform usage, reports, or delivery.
4. Technical & Process Excellence
5. Perform root cause analysis on recurring issues and suggest sustainable fixes.
6. Leverage UI and backend knowledge for effective troubleshooting.
7. Recommend process improvements and product enhancements based on real customer feedback.

About:
We are Mintifi, a Mumbai-based fintech company building India's first data-driven supply chain financing platform. We are proud to be the second fintech company in India to receive funding from the IFC, the equity arm of the World Bank. At Mintifi, we are addressing the critical challenge of inefficient and costly access to credit for millions of Indian distributors and retailers by leveraging data-driven and next-generation credit models. We are transforming the supply chain lending landscape by digitizing end-to-end processes, enabling faster decision-making through technology, utilizing machine learning to enhance credit models, applying artificial intelligence to elevate customer experiences, and developing intuitive mobile and web interfaces to ensure seamless lending experiences. Our product is a sophisticated integration of web applications, native mobile apps, big data analytics platforms, and machine learning models, forming a deep aggregation ecosystem that connects manufacturers, banking institutions, third-party services, and Mintifi's core systems. If you are passionate about solving complex problems, thrive in dynamic environments, and want to be part of an exciting and challenging journey, Mintifi offers tremendous growth opportunities where you can play a pivotal role in shaping and driving the strategic direction of our products in business loans, supply chain financing, and BNPL.

Key Responsibilities:

A. Anchor hunting:
1. To identify relevant industries and companies for potential collaboration on channel financing with Mintifi.
2. Thorough research on the industry segment and company to understand the financial position, distribution network and working capital cycle so as to be able to pitch a relevant product to suit their requirements.
3. Identifying the relevant stakeholders in the company (sales, finance) and engaging with them.

B. Anchor onboarding:
1. Working closely with Risk and Legal teams in onboarding the anchor (corporate partner) formally into the system.
2. Engaging with the anchor and obtaining relevant data to start the programme.

C. Account management:
1. Working closely with the internal sales team as well as Anchor's sales teams and credit team to ensure maximum conversion of leads.
2. Monitoring the first 10-15 transactions personally to ensure minimal friction.
3. To ensure a continuous healthy pipeline.
4. To be the escalation contact for the anchor for all queries and resolve them at the earliest.
5. Maintain constant communication with the anchor and share regular reports, new
product offerings, etc.

About:
We're looking for a skilled Full Stack Data Platform Engineer who thrives at the intersection of software development, modern data infrastructure, and internal tools.
You'll help architect and build robust APIs, manage databases like PostgreSQL and Supabase, and contribute to the frontend when needed all while enabling automation and actionable business insights.
This role combines backend craftsmanship with data intuition to power internal tools, data reporting pipelines, and intelligent automation systems.

Key responsibilities:

A. Application & API Development
1. Design and maintain scalable backend services using Python (Django).
2. Build and optimize RESTful or GraphQL APIs for internal and external use.
3. Integrate and manage PostgreSQL/Supabase databases.
4. Occasionally contribute to frontend tasks (React, Vue, or basic HTML/CSS/JS).
5. Ensure performance, security, and reliability across the stack.

B. Database Engineering
1. Design and normalize database schemas for scale and performance.
2. Implement backup, restore, and security protocols.
3. Monitor and optimize query performance for large-scale datasets.

C. API & System Integration
1. Develop and document APIs for seamless service-to-service data exchange.
2. Integrate with third-party and internal tools using OAuth, JWT, etc.
3. Maintain version control and backward compatibility.

D. Data Reporting & Analytics
1. Build automated and ad-hoc data reports and dashboards.
2. Translate business goals into metrics, KPIs, and analytics pipelines.
3. Conduct exploratory data analysis (EDA) to uncover trends and anomalies.

E. Automation & Internal Tooling
1. Identify manual workflows and automate them using code or no-code tools.
2. Work with cross-functional teams to scale internal processes.
3. Build end-to-end automation from data ingestion to insights delivery.

About:
We're looking for a skilled Full Stack Data Platform Engineer who thrives at the intersection of software development, modern data infrastructure, and internal tools.
You'll help architect and build robust APIs, manage databases like PostgreSQL and Supabase, and contribute to the frontend when needed all while enabling automation and actionable business insights.
This role combines backend craftsmanship with data intuition to power internal tools, data reporting pipelines, and intelligent automation systems.

Key responsibilities:

A. Application & API Development
1. Design and maintain scalable backend services using Python (Django).
2. Build and optimize RESTful or GraphQL APIs for internal and external use.
3. Integrate and manage PostgreSQL/Supabase databases.
4. Occasionally contribute to frontend tasks (React, Vue, or basic HTML/CSS/JS).

We're on a mission to bring intelligent automation to the world, starting with automating document processing. Our deep learning models convert any type of paper document into structured data. We've already implemented our solutions at several top insurance companies in India, helping them reduce operational costs and manual data entry efforts. Job Purpose

The Assistant Manager SCM will be responsible for ensuring smooth coordination between factory operations, sales, purchase, and other departments. The role involves effective planning, order tracking, and ensuring timely dispatches by aligning with production and procurement teams.

Key Responsibilities

Act as a single point of contact between the factory and sales team for order-related coordination.
Collaborate with the purchase team to confirm Bought Out Parts (BOP) requirements and update the monthly systemized production plan.
Coordinate with interdepartmental teams within the factory to ensure smooth order processing and on-time delivery.
Consolidate production schedules, obtain tentative completion dates from production, and ETA of BOP from purchase, to finalize dispatch timelines.
Circulate daily Finished Goods (FG) stock reports with complete details to relevant stakeholders.
Share daily dispatch plans and billing updates with the sales team.
Prepare RPA (Root Cause/Problem Analysis) for service-related issues and ensure resolution through coordination with all concerned departments until material dispatch.
Monitor inventory levels and support effective utilization of available stock.
Ensure adherence to company policies, process compliance, and timely reporting to SCM/Planning HOD.

JobTitle: Graphic Designer Part Time Job: For AI Training - Fresher
About:
We're Looking For "Graphic & Visual Designers" for AI Training (Part-Time | Remote)

Location: Remote (India)
Type: Part-Time Job | Flexible Hours
Compensation: Up to Rs 90,000/Month, performance-based bonuses


Bring Your Design Expertise to the Future of AI
Do you live and breathe visual design? Are you curious about the future of artificial intelligence? Join us, where your creative talents will help train and refine cutting-edge AI systems.

We're looking for Graphic Design professionals who are passionate about aesthetics, communication, and technology. This is your opportunity to shape how AI understands and applies design principles all while working remotely, on your schedule, and earning competitive compensation.


Key responsibilities:

1. Craft real-world prompts to train AI models in graphic design thinking, visual problem-solving, and creativity.
2. Evaluate AI-generated outputs reviewing visual responses, identifying strengths/weaknesses, and ensuring high-quality design standards.
3. Provide expert feedback using your knowledge in layout, color, typography, branding, and visual communication.
4. Contribute to multiple design-focused projects depending on your experience (e.g., UI/UX, motion graphics, digital media, etc.).


Compensation & Work Structure
1. Rate: Up to $40/hour USD, based on experience.
2. Bonuses: Additional earnings available based on project success.
3. Type: Freelance (1099) not an internship or full-time employment.
4. Payouts: Weekly, via secure platform.
5. Work Hours: Fully flexible you choose when and how much to contribute.
6. Location: Remote, from one of the supported countries.


Why Join Us?
1. Work From Anywhere: 100% remote opportunity.
2. Total Flexibility: Set your schedule and workload.
3. Impact the Future: Help shape how AI understands the visual world.
4. Grow Your Skills: Get exposed to cutting-edge technologies at the intersection of design and AI.
OtherReq:
1. Bachelor’s degree (or active enrollment) in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, UI/UX, or a related design field.

2. Strong foundational understanding of design principles, theory, and digital applications.

3. Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills — able to assess and articulate both technical and aesthetic quality.

4. Strong written communication — capable of explaining creative decisions in clear, High attention to detail — especially in reviewing and critiquing visual outputs.

5. Experience in graphic design, branding, digital content, UI/UX, or motion graphics.

6. Prior writing/editing work (e.g., content strategy, copywriting, technical writing).

7. Familiarity or interest in AI tools, machine learning, or creative tech platforms.

About:
Founding Backend Engineer (Java / Spring Boot) - Sustainability Platform
Location: Remote-first (IST 3h) / Delhi
Type: Full-Time

About Us
We are an innovative climate-tech startup building a cloud-native ESG & carbon accounting platform to help organizations track, manage, and reduce their environmental footprint. Our tools enable manufacturers and enterprises to comply with global regulations, meet net-zero targets, and make data-driven sustainability decisions.
If you're passionate about technology, sustainability, and solving real-world climate challenges, this is your chance to shape a product from the ground up and make a global impact.

What You'll Do
As a Founding Backend Engineer, you will:

Back-End Development: Design and implement scalable microservices with Spring Boot (REST APIs, data services, batch jobs).

Carbon Data Services: Build and maintain APIs for GHG activity data, carbon accounting, and ESG metrics.

Data Management: Design relational & NoSQL schemas, manage migrations, and optimize queries for large sustainability datasets.

Cloud Integration: Deploy and operate services in cloud environments (GCP/AWS/Azure) with containers & orchestration (Kubernetes/Docker).

Continuous Delivery: Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and observability.

Security & Compliance: Implement OAuth2.0, JWT, Spring Security, and ensure best practices for handling sensitive regulatory data.

Collaboration: Work closely with product and sustainability teams, ensuring alignment between technical implementation and ESG reporting requirements.

Core Qualifications
5+ years of experience in Java (11+/17) with strong OOP and functional design skills.
Deep expertise in Spring Boot (Web, JPA, Security) for building scalable backend systems.
Strong database skills: PostgreSQL, schema design, migrations, SQL optimization.
Knowledge of microservice design patterns (REST, caching, fault tolerance, multi-tenancy).
CI/CD, Git workflows, Gradle/Maven build tools.
Experience deploying applications on cloud platforms (GCP preferred, AWS/Azure welcome).
Test-Driven Development: JUnit 5, Mockito, Testcontainers.
Solid understanding of authentication & authorization (OAuth 2.0, JWT).

Nice-to-Haves
Familiarity with ESG metrics, GHG reporting, or carbon accounting systems.
Cloud-native skills: Kubernetes, Docker, container orchestration.
Frontend exposure (Angular/React) for end-to-end collaboration.
Prior experience in a startup or fast-paced environment.

Soft Skills
Strong problem-solving and debugging mindset.
Clear and proactive communication.
Ownership and accountability for production-grade systems.
Passion for sustainability, climate action, and building meaningful technology.

About:
Management Trainee - Virtual Care

Let's talk spine - because most of India doesn't. Founded when surgery was the only mainstream solution to back pain, QI Spine emerged with a simple idea: non-surgical recovery should be the first option, not the last resort. Since then, we've built India's only spine-focused medical system - combining the expertise of 250+ specialists with cutting-edge AI tools like Doctor QI, our proprietary diagnostic engine. With 22 clinics across major cities, we've:

Consulted over 2.5 lakh patients
Prevented 15,000+ unnecessary spine surgeries
Achieved a 95% recovery rate - among the best in the world

Our mission?

To redefine spine care by blending clinical excellence, intelligent systems, and strong operational discipline.

About the Role:

We are seeking a highly motivated and digitally native Management Trainee - Virtual Care to join our pioneering team. This is a unique opportunity for an aspiring leader to contribute to the strategic development and scaling of QI Spine's virtual care category. You will work closely with senior leadership to research, analyze, and implement innovative virtual solutions that extend our clinical excellence beyond physical clinics, enhance patient access, and improve outcomes. This role requires a blend of strategic thinking, analytical prowess, strong communication, and a deep, patient-centric mindset, with a focus on building new processes and adapting to a rapidly evolving digital healthcare landscape.

Key Responsibilities;

1. Strategically Build Virtual Care: You'll help develop our virtual care services by understanding the market, identifying growth opportunities, and planning how to expand our reach with offerings like tele-consultations and remote monitoring.
2. Leverage Data & Technology: You'll use data analysis (Excel, analytics tools) to interpret virtual care trends, quickly adapt to new technologies, and use project management tools to streamline initiatives.
3. Lead Projects & Collaborate: You'll coordinate effectively with medical, operations, tech, and marketing teams, helping execute virtual care projects from strategy to implementation and influencing key decisions.
4. Communicate & Document Clearly: You'll excel at written and verbal communication for proposals and strategies, document new processes, present effectively virtually, and create basic digital content.
5. Drive Growth & Solve Problems: You'll continuously learn and adapt, creatively solve challenges in virtual care, proactively identify market gaps, and be comfortable building new processes from scratch in an evolving environment.

What We're Looking For:

Ideal Profile: A strategic thinker with natural empathy, strong communication skills, and the drive to build and scale QI Spine's virtual care category while maintaining clinical excellence standards.

Key Skills:

1. Digital & Analytical: Fast learner with technology, good at data analysis (Excel, analytics tools), project management, and research.
2. Communication: Excellent at writing, speaking, documenting processes, giving virtual presentations, and basic digital content creation.
3. Soft Skills (Category Management, Healthcare Focus, Business & Leadership, Growth & Problem- Solving): Strategic thinking, market understanding, revenue identification, patient empathy, interest in healthcare innovation, emotional intelligence, business awareness, teamwork, influencing skills, project execution, continuous learning, creative problem-solving, proactive initiative, and comfort with new ventures.

Experience & Education:

0-2 years of experience in a fast-paced, analytical, or project-based role (digital health, e- commerce, consulting preferred).
Demonstrated experience in data analysis, research, or strategy development.

Any Graduate. Master's degree (MBA, MHA, etc.) with a focus on Healthcare Management, Digital Business, or Strategy highly preferred.

What You'll Get:

A mission-critical role impacting patient access and the future of spine care.
Unique opportunity to build and scale a new strategic category (Virtual Care) from scratch.

High ownership and exposure to digital health business needs.
Direct mentorship and collaboration with expert teams.

A challenging yet rewarding environment shaping remote spine care.
A collaborative and mission-driven workplace where you can be a "QIpreneur."

Let's build better spine care. www.qispine.com

About:
Key Responsibilities:

1. Academic instruction: The faculty member shall be responsible for delivering high-quality lectures, tutorials, and practical demonstrations in Human Physiology to undergraduate dental students (BDS). This includes preparing structured lesson plans, aligning content with the Dental Council of India (DCI) curriculum, and ensuring conceptual clarity with clinical relevance.
2. Student evaluation and mentorship: They must design and conduct internal assessments, viva voce, and practical examinations. The faculty is expected to provide academic guidance, identify learning gaps, and mentor students to improve performance and professional development.
3. Laboratory oversight: The faculty shall supervise physiology laboratory sessions, ensuring adherence to safety protocols and proper handling of instruments. They are responsible for maintaining lab equipment, consumables, and documentation of experiments conducted.
4. Research and scholarly contribution: Active participation in departmental research initiatives is expected. The faculty should contribute to scientific publications, attend academic conferences, and foster a culture of inquiry among students.
5. Regulatory and documentation compliance: The faculty must maintain accurate records of attendance, teaching hours, and student performance. They are required to assist in preparing documentation for DCI inspections, internal audits, and accreditation processes.
6. Interdisciplinary collaboration: They should coordinate with departments such as anatomy, biochemistry, and clinical sciences to support integrated teaching modules. Participation in curriculum development and interdisciplinary academic activities is essential.
7. Institutional engagement and development: The faculty is expected to attend faculty meetings, workshops, and training programs. They should contribute to student welfare initiatives, uphold institutional discipline, and support the college's academic and administrative goals.

Teaching

About Us:
We're Black Cherie, a product launch studio driven by innovation, ideas, and a genuine love for delivering results that matter. We help clients bring big visions to life, whether it's through technology, creative campaigns, or both. Now, we're looking for a results oriented Sales Executive who thrives on making things happen, loves connecting with people, and is ready to push boundaries.


Your Mission:
As a Sales Executive, you'll be at the front line of our growth engine, turning conversations into opportunities, and opportunities into partnerships. You'll work closely with our leadership and delivery teams to identify prospects, manage relationships, and close deals that make an impact.


Key responsibilities:

1. Appointment Setting: Identify and reach out to prospects to book qualified meetings.
2. Calendar Management: Coordinate calls, demos, and follow ups like a pro.
3. CRM Management: Keep our pipeline neat, updated, and data driven.
4. Warm Outbound: Nurture and re engage leads already familiar with us.
5. Cold Outreach: Confidently introduce our solutions to new prospects via email, LinkedIn, and calls.
6. End to End Sales: Own the process, from first hello to signed agreement.
7. Pipeline Management: Track opportunities, forecast revenue, and keep momentum moving.


Why You'll Love Working Here:
1. Competitive base salary & incentive structure.
2. We value hunters who go beyond the comfort zone; our commission plan rewards those who create their own luck.
3. Supportive team, creative environment, and plenty of room for experimentation.
4. Chance to work across exciting industries with both tech innovators and creative brands.

Ready to kickstart your career in sales?
Bring your communication skills and proactive attitude to the table, and be part of an environment where your potential is limitless and every day presents new opportunities to succeed

Who are we, you ask?
At Interview Kickstart (IK), we help candidates succeed in their toughest technical interviews for top companies like Google, Facebook, Netflix, and more. We provide intensive prep courses led by current and former hiring managers at these top tech companies. Since our inception, we've successfully trained over 25,000 engineers, helping them achieve their career goals.

Role Overview:
We are seeking motivated and well-spoken Junior Program Advisors to join our sales team. In this role, you will be responsible for communicating with potential customers, understanding their needs, and ensuring a smooth sales process. You will help close sales and meet targets while maintaining strong customer relationships and delivering excellent service. If you're eager to start your career in sales and work with a high-performing team, this is the role for you!

Key responsibilities:

1. Customer Communication: Reach out to potential customers via outbound calls, emails, and follow-ups.
2. Understanding Needs: Engage with customers to assess their requirements and recommend the most suitable solutions.
3. Product Explanation: Clearly articulate the features and benefits of our products and services.
4. Information Sharing: Respond to customer queries and provide additional product details as needed.
5. CRM Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of current and potential customers in the CRM system.
6. Customer Satisfaction: Build strong rapport and ensure a positive customer experience throughout the sales process.
7. Upselling: Identify and leverage opportunities to upsell products or services based on customer needs.


If you're passionate about sales and excited to work in a dynamic and fast-growing company, apply today to join Interview Kickstart!
OtherReq:
1. Education: Any Graduate (BE/Btech preferred)

2. Experience: Fresher with a strong interest in sales.
Salary:
: 5L per annum
Work Mode: On-site
Shift: 10:00 AM- 7:00 PM
Perks & Allowances: Uncapped Incentives (Laptops will be provided)

Ready to kickstart your career in sales?
Bring your communication skills and proactive attitude to the table, and be part of an environment where your potential is limitless and every day presents new opportunities to succeed

Who are we, you ask?
At Interview Kickstart (IK), we help candidates succeed in their toughest technical interviews for top companies like Google, Facebook, Netflix, and more. We provide intensive prep courses led by current and former hiring managers at these top tech companies. Since our inception, we've successfully trained over 25,000 engineers, helping them achieve their career goals.

Role Overview:
We are seeking motivated and well-spoken Junior Program Advisors to join our sales team. In this role, you will be responsible for communicating with potential customers, understanding their needs, and ensuring a smooth sales process. You will help close sales and meet targets while maintaining strong customer relationships and delivering excellent service. If you're eager to start your career in sales and work with a high-performing team, this is the role for you!

Key responsibilities:

1. Customer Communication: Reach out to potential customers via outbound calls, emails, and follow-ups.
2. Understanding Needs: Engage with customers to assess their requirements and recommend the most suitable solutions.
3. Product Explanation: Clearly articulate the features and benefits of our products and services.
4. Information Sharing: Respond to customer queries and provide additional product details as needed.
5. CRM Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of current and potential customers in the CRM system.
6. Customer Satisfaction: Build strong rapport and ensure a positive customer experience throughout the sales process.
7. Upselling: Identify and leverage opportunities to upsell products or services based on customer needs.


If you're passionate about sales and excited to work in a dynamic and fast-growing company, apply today to join Interview Kickstart!

About:
Join AlmaShines Technologies as a Business Consultant!

Location: Ahmedabad, India (Onsite)
Employment Type: Full-time, Onsite
Experience: 1-3 years

Role Overview:
We are looking for ambitious, growth-oriented individuals to join us as Business Consultants. This role is perfect for early-career professionals who want to fast-track their career by building strong business acumen, client engagement skills, and solution-design expertise.
You'll work with diverse organizations, understand their unique challenges, and co-create solutions that help them succeed. This is not just a job, it's an opportunity to be part of a platform that's transforming community management on a global scale


This Role is for You if You Want To:

1. Accelerate Your Career Growth: Gain hands-on experience in business consulting, client relationship management, and problem-solving in a fast-paced environment.
2. Work with Purpose: Help institutions, NGOs, and communities solve real-world challenges while making a meaningful impact.
3. Develop Strategic Thinking: Learn to analyze complex needs and design innovative, impactful solutions.
4. Collaborate with Industry Experts: Work closely with experienced professionals and thought leaders in community engagement.
5. Be Part of a Visionary Team: Contribute to a mission-driven company that is shaping the future of community management globally.


Key responsibilities:

1. Client Identification & Outreach: Research and connect with organizations that can benefit from AlmaShines' solutions.
2. Client Engagement: Conduct discovery sessions, understand needs, and gather insights to recommend tailored solutions.
3. Collaborative Solution Design: Work with product and customer success teams to ensure solutions deliver measurable value.
4. Market Research: Stay informed about industry trends and emerging opportunities for community engagement.
5. Product Demonstrations: Showcase AlmaShines' capabilities and demonstrate how we can help clients achieve their goals
6. Onboarding Support: Partner with the implementation teams to ensure a smooth client onboarding and long-term success.


Why Join Us?

1. Work with a mission-driven organization making a global impact
2. Gain mentorship and collaborate with industry leaders
3. Develop strategic thinking, client engagement, and consulting skills
4. Be part of an innovative and fast-growing team


Compensation (CTC):

1. Fixed: INR 4,69,200/Year to 5,05,200/Year
2. Variable: INR 1,68,000/Year to INR 2,88,000/Year
3. Total Package: INR 6,37,200/Year to INR 7,93,200/Year


This will be based on your experience, skills, and alignment with the role. We believe in fair, performance-driven compensation and ensure clarity from day one to make the hiring process transparent for both sides.

Important: Candidates whose expected CTC aligns with the above structure are encouraged to apply.
